External dependencies needed to build DIPlib et al., and statically linked in.

doctest/    doctest 2.4.8     https://github.com/onqtam/doctest

eigen3/     Eigen 3.3.9       https://eigen.tuxfamily.org

libics/     libics v.1.6.2    https://github.com/svi-opensource/libics
libjpeg/    libjpeg 9c        https://www.ijg.org
libtiff/    LibTIFF 4.0.10    https://gitlab.com/libtiff/libtiff
zlib/       zlib 1.2.11       http://www.zlib.net

pybind11/   pybind11 2.9.0    https://github.com/pybind/pybind11

We don't include test code, examples, etc. from the original source distributions.
